data.question: Question 1: Has the Party, in accordance with Article 14 of the Barcelona Convention, adopted legislation implementing the provisions of the Land Based Sources and Activities Protocol (LBS Protocol) as listed in Table I below?
data.table_label: Table I: Legal and Regulatory Measures
